title: Super Vegan
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Juice bar, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: 非常素, at 黄浦区徐家汇路618号下二楼亚洲馆, was Taiwan Brothers 7 re-branded, Oct 2015. Food is vegan, using some mock meat. Some English spoken, with English-Chinese menu. It's situated inside a gigantic food mall consisting of multiple levels (can easily get lost inside) -- it's on level B-2 at the DaPuQiao subway station off line 9 - head to Exit 2 and turn right into restaurant area just before exit escalator. See HappyCow photos with accompany directions. Accepts Alipay.
streetAddress: 618 Xu Jia Hui, Huang Pu District
